Text: I remember how good rating this movie supposedly got.. and big of a deal it was. 3 years later, I see it in the blowout movie bin at stores everywhere. Hollywood can't make anything good anymore.

Another thing, DO NOT add a hundred trackers to your torrent. It slows things down and some trackers are actually those used by anti-p2p companies to track connections. I would suggest before starting this torrent, delete all the trackers except for 2 or so working ones.
this movie is being watched I received a letter from my ISP for downloading it
